definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
to walk (side part of split character)
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)

sentences.english: He heard the contents of the glass being poured into the sink .
sentences.chinese: 他聽到杯中物被倒進水盆裏。

sentences.english: At this moment the cannon of the harbor is heard firing, and Suzuki hurries in, saying that it is a warship.
sentences.chinese: 就在這時港口一聲炮響，鈴木跑進來說是一艘軍艦。

sentences.english: He went about the job like a bull in a china shop.
sentences.chinese: 他幹這種活就想公牛進了瓷器店那樣莽撞。

sentences.english: And it is this belief that leads us to include these arts in the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 正是這個觀點，我們將藝術襄括進了學校課程之中。

sentences.english: Both attended private schools and pursued their respective passions.
sentences.chinese: 他們都進私立學校，並追求自己的理想。

sentences.english: This, however, happens only during the first hundred years of their damnation.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況只發生在他們進地獄的頭一百年。

sentences.english: Spain scored in the final minute of the game.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙隊在比賽最後一分鐘進了一球。

sentences.english: Her son was sent to the big house for stealing classified papers.
sentences.chinese: 她的兒子因爲盜竊歸好類的文件而被送進了監獄。

sentences.english: Sb. could fall into shit and come up smelling of roses !
sentences.chinese: 那傢伙運氣特別好，掉進糞坑裏還能揀個金元寶。

sentences.english: I'm seriously considering joining a monastry and taking holy orders .
sentences.chinese: 我正在慎重地考慮進修道院當修道士。

sentences.english: Put the flour in the bowl and then beat the eggs in.
sentences.chinese: 進一些麪粉，然後打幾隻雞蛋攪拌進去。

sentences.english: Often rather and slowly hike to her mercilessly rumple contiguous she into bosom in.
sentences.chinese: 常寧慢慢走到她的身邊，狠狠的將她揉進懷中。

sentences.english: Care must be taken to completely seal entrance plugs(eg. at a manway)in refractory linings.
sentences.chinese: 必須小心地完全封閉耐火材料襯裏的進口門。

sentences.english: All correspondence will be made via email only.
sentences.chinese: 所有通訊將以電郵方式進行。

sentences.english: As for Saul, he made havock of the church, entering into every house, and haling men and women committed them to prison.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅卻殘害教會，進各人的家，拉着男女下在監裏。

sentences.english: The promoters figured "peace" would link the anti-war sentiment to the rock concert.
sentences.chinese: 促進者們表示，“和平”將反戰情緒帶進搖滾音樂會。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
